title: Hour 1 - Pulling Pitchers, NBA vs. Kyrie Irving, Al Leiter
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Pulling Pitchers, NBA vs. Kyrie Irving, Al Leiter
description:
Dan says most World Series pitching records will never be broken with the quick hooks employed by MLB managers in this era. He wonders why the NBA has been mum about Kyrie Irving's borderline anti-Semitic tweet. And former MLB P Al Leiter drops by with some World Series analysis.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
